title: Bacon Potato Cakes with Ham Steak, Egg, and Sliced Avocado

Ingredients.2: 1 (20 ounce) package refrigerated hash brown potatoes

Ingredients.3: 8 slices Pure Farmland® All Natural Uncured Bacon, cooked, roughly chopped

Ingredients.10: 1 Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste

Ingredients.12: 4 slices Farmland® Ham Steak, cut in half

Ingredients.13: 4  eggs, sunny side up, or cooked to your choice

Directions.1: Bacon Potato Cakes: In large bowl, combine potatoes, bacon, Parmesan cheese, flour, garlic, eggs, green onions, and cayenne pepper; season with salt and pepper.

Directions.2: Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Scoop tablespoons of batter for each pancake, flattening with spatula, and cook until underside is nicely golden brown, about 2 to 3 minutes. Flip and cook on other side, about 2 minutes longer.

Directions.3: To Serve: Place bacon potato cakes on plate and top with ham steak. Top with fried eggs, followed by sliced avocado fanned on top.
